attributes.action: Make cyclists pay road tax or abandon these new road rules.
attributes.additional_details: I think this new rule makes it unsafe for pedestrians and cyclists and unfair to vehicle drivers who do pay for insurance, MOT etc.
attributes.background: Since cyclists now have more rights than vehicles on the road, they should be required to pay road tax. It’s not fair that a car owner has to pay road tax, car insurance and MOT for us vehicle users to not even have full rights on the road.
